mapper.select: select * from ac_api_project where id = #{id , jdbcType=BIGINT}

select a.id as id, a.target as target, a.service_url as serviceUrl, a.atype as atype, a.create_time as createTime, a.update_time as updateTime, a.update_user_id as updateUserId, a.update_user_name as updater from ac_api_project a
a.aflag = 1 and a.delete_flag = 1
and a.target = #{target , jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by a.id asc

select a.id as id, a.target as target, a.service_url as serviceUrl, a.atype as atype, a.create_time as createTime, a.update_time as updateTime, a.update_user_id as updateUserId, a.update_user_name as updater from ac_api_project a where a.aflag = 1 and a.delete_flag = 1 order by a.id asc
mapper.insert:
insert into ac_api_project
id,
target,
atype,
service_url,
aflag,
create_time,
create_user_id,
create_user_name,
update_time,
update_user_id,
update_user_name,
delete_flag,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{target,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{atype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{serviceUrl , jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{aflag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createTime , jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{createUserId , jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{createUserName , jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updateTime , jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateUserId , jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{updateUserName , jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{deleteFlag , jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update ac_api_project
target = #{target,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
atype = #{atype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
service_url = #{serviceUrl , jdbcType=VARCHAR},
aflag = #{aflag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = #{updateTime , jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user_id = #{updateUserId , jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_user_name = #{updateUserName , jdbcType=VARCHAR},
delete_flag = #{deleteFlag , jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
